subject: Football
Plea Bargaining
Dogfighting
lead_paragraph: Soon after Michael Vick walks into a courtroom to plead guilty to dogfighting charges Monday, the Atlanta Falcons are expected to lay out their plans to move on without him.
snippet: Soon after Michael Vick walks into a courtroom to plead guilty to dogfighting charges Monday, the Atlanta Falcons are expected to lay out their plans to move on without him.
